meanings.definition: To be extremely unhappy or despondent.
meanings.sent1: He tends to oversad when things don't go his way.
meanings.sent2: She oversad for days after the breakup.
meanings.sent3: The cat oversad dramatically when denied treats.
meanings.sent4: The flowers oversad in the heat of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The child's face oversad as the ice cream fell to the ground.
